title: You're Going to Want More Categories [LB 3.737]
description: In this Kernel, I work off of https://www.kaggle.com/rooshroosh/simple-data-exploration-with-python-lb-3-760 but include category_1, category_2, and category_3 from the transactions tables, which end up being very important features when aggregated by mean. Hopefully this shows how you can incorporate more categorical data into your kernel.
